title: 3 Bedrooms Luxury Apartment for Sale in Rajagiriya
details:
3 Bedroom | 2 Bathroom | Swimming Pool | Gym

• Property type – Luxury Apartment (Fully Air Conditioned).
• Asking price – 35 Million (Negotiable).
• Area – 1384 Sq Ft
• Floor – 6th Floor
• Bedrooms – 03
• Bathrooms – 02 (With shower cubical)

INTERIOR DETAILS
• Internal areas laid with non-slippery ceramic floor tiles.
• Fully fitted pantry, cooker hood and a hob and Granite top.
• Gas piping system (Central gas supply).
• Wall mounted commode and a concealed cistern, wall mounted wash basin and, soap tray, tooth brush holder, hand bidet, toilet paper holder, pencil edged mirror and aluminum glazed Shower slider to be fixed for all bathrooms.
• Hot water supplied via Geezer (15 Liter capacity) for all bath rooms.
• A/C 12,000 BTU in Living/ Dining, Master Bed Room and other bedrooms.
• CEILING FANS
• Front door to be out of Teak sash and red balaw frame, internal doors to be out of Mahogany timber sash and red balw frame.


EXTERIOR DETAILS
• Fully equipped gymnasium
• Swimming pool and changing room
• Common club house & roof top terrace
• 1 Parking slot allocated for each unit
• Separate area is allocated for garbage collection on ground floor
• 2 passenger lifts
• Generator facility
• 24 hour security
• Visitors car parking Facility
